snippet.title: Trailer - Iris
snippet.description:
Best viewed in the big player (for the texts in the game)

Iris is a 2D side scrolling action platformer developed by Ethereal Equilibrium from Digipen Institute of Technology (Singapore).

Player will take the role of Iris and travel to the exquisite world of Chromaland to save her sister, Siri. She will defeat the otherworldly creatures and overcome obstacles using the ancient bow and arrow that was summoned from the magical bracelet she picked up long ago while exploring the Forbidden Forest.

Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/IrisJourney

P,S. We would like to thank Vuk Krakovic for helping us in creating the amazing and captivating set of music and sounds for Iris despite having other student projects to work on. In addition, we also would like to thank our playtesters for their wonderful feedbacks that allow us to further improve Iris.
